title: Lankatiles achieves 48% growth in brand value
body_lines: Sri Lanka’s market leader in floor and wall tiles, Lankatiles, made to Brand Finance’s “Most Valuable Consumer Brands Index” yet again in 2022, climbing 10 positions from the previous year. This indicates a 48% growth in brand value which is an impressive feat especially under the prevailing economic climate.

Lankatiles emerged as the Most Valuable Brand in the “Tile” category cementing its position as the undisputed market leader. Brand Finance is the world’s leading brand valuation consultancy that strives to bridge the gap between marketing & finance. The Most Valuable Brands Index is constantly changing with the times to reflect the external changes in the business environment.

Commenting on this achievement, the Managing Director of Lanka Walltiles PLC and Lanka Tiles PLC, Mahendra Jayasekara said: ” We are cautiously optimistic about economic recovery in the foreseeable future and look forward to contributing to same specially through catering to our export market which has seen exponential growth YoY.”
